If you're using Maven you can use category support in surefire, again just
=
specifying a slow list and having the default as the fast list.  Personally=

I prefer having my tests in separate root source trees.

On Mon, Jan 21, 2=
013 at 9:13 PM, Mark Levison <mark@...> wrote:

otations and you need separate slow and

ludes/excludes from the command line.
